Baked scrambled eggs12 eggs3 oz cream cheese1 1/2 cups milksalt, pepper, tabasco sauce1/4 cup butterHeat oven to 350. Melt butter in a 9" x 13" pan or casserole (lasagna pan is perfect).  Beat eggs, ad milk and cream cheese cut into small pieces.  Add salt, pepper, and tabasco sauce.  Pour into pan.  Bake at 350 for 20 minutes, stirring once or twice.
